dublin_core.dcvalue: This work presents an important part of our telemedicine system for critical care units a distributed module based on intelligent agents technology that is dedicated to the process management of a network for medical monitoring including distribution and control of processing tasks and bandwidth management The system provides the real time acquisition and analysis of physiological data the graphical visualisation of these data and their transmission to a central system charged with the collection and control of all the information concerning the patient including knowledge based systems KBS for medical reasoning
Intelligent agents technology applied to tasks scheduling and communications management in a critical care telemonitoring system.
